name: RW_pixelart
description:
PIXEL ART V1

I am from robot workshop and this lora model creates pixel art images.

IMPORTANT: this Lora was trained with 1024x1024 images so I recomend using generations of 1024x1024 or at least highres fix to values around 1024.

I recomend using Higher quality models like the ChilloutMix https://civitai.com/models/6424?modelVersionId=11745 or Lyriel https://civitai.com/models/22922/lyriel, to have more precision, but any model should work fine with it.

With 1024x1024 straight with the models I mentioned above, you will have very decent pixel formats.

This is my first Lora realease but I will make it better.

meta.prompt: <lora:pixelart:1> ((game pixel art)), mix4,(8k, RAW photo, best quality, masterpiece:1.2), (realistic, photo-realistic:1.37),1girl,cute,cityscape, night, rain, wet,professional lighting, photon mapping, radiosity, physically-based rendering, full body,thighhighs,legs together, breasts, peeing,
meta.negativePrompt: ((disfigured)),  ((deformed)),((extra limbs)), ((extra barrel)),((close up)),((b&w)), weird colors, blurry, (((duplicate))), ((morbid)), ((mutilated)), [out of frame], extra fingers, mutated hands, ((poorly drawn hands)), ((poorly drawn face)), (((mutation))), (((deformed))), ((ugly)), blurry, ((bad anatomy)), (((bad proportions))), ((extra limbs))
